full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA'I SMON LAM BDUN BCU PA BZHUGS, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,SLOB DPON BTZUN PA GZHAN LA PHAN PA'I RTA DBYANGS DGON PA PA, GSUNG RAB MTHA' DAG CHUB PAR BYAS PA, STAG GIS RANG LA SKYON TE NAGS KHUNG DU BYIN PA NA SNYING RJES GDUNG BA'I YID KYIS 'GRO BA'I DON DU MA 'GRUB PA'I SMON LAM BDUN CU PA MDZAD PA RDZOGS SO, RGYAG GYI MKHAN PO DHARMA SHRI BRABHA WA DANG, LO TZVA PA BANDHE DPAL GYI LHUN PO SDES BSGYUR CING ZHUS TE GTAN LA PHAB PA'O,, ,,
